## Type

- [ ] Update existing translations
- [ ] Add new locale

## Checklist

- [ ] JSON syntax is valid
- [ ] ICU placeholders match the source (`en-US`)
- [ ] Translations are natural and contextually appropriate for the target language
- [ ] No machine translation without human review
